welcome.title: Artificial Intelligence Behavior Analysis System
welcome.subtitle: Advanced AI-Powered Security & Surveillance
welcome.description: INFINITY PHOENIX presents the AIB system - cutting-edge deep learning technology with 80-90% accuracy, monitoring 35-40 cameras per AI server with automatic real-time alerts.

mainProduct.name: Intelligent Behavior Analysis Equipment Set
mainProduct.description: The AIB Intelligent Behavior Analysis System applies artificial intelligence (AI) for video surveillance and automatic detection of abnormal behaviors on camera systems. Deep Learning technology enables accurate recognition of dangerous or violation situations, sending real-time alerts to operators. The system supports zone setup, security scenario creation, camera-based configuration, and visual monitoring. AIB detects diverse behaviors including restricted area intrusion, climbing, fighting, weapon carrying, vandalism, smoking, gambling, as well as emergencies like suicide risk or abnormal falls.

performance.title: Performance Specifications
performance.cameraCapacity: Simultaneous camera support: 35-40 cameras per AI server

features.title: Key Features
features.detection: Detect and alert on object behaviors
features.configuration: Configure and draw monitoring zones per camera
features.alerting: Recognize and alert on violation behaviors

behaviors.title: Monitored Behaviors
behaviors.item6: Cutting window bars (using wire or saw)
behaviors.item11: Distinguishing falls from stroke vs. fighting/accidents
behaviors.item12: Identifying and naming objects in frame
